entry.source: Supposedly, people are seeing shooting stars{F801}in the sky above Tokyo. Of course, since we{F801}can't see the sky, it has to be a demon...{F801}In order to oppose it, we need an immortal{F801}god just like it. Bring me a {F804,5}Baldur.{F804,0} I'll get{F801}the two of them to fight each other forever.{F801}
